title: FC Swift Hesperange
text:
Football Club Swift Hesperange (, ) is a <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="football%20club">club</a>, based in <a href="Hesperange">Hesperange</a>, in southern <a href="Luxembourg">Luxembourg</a>.
History.
In the <a href="Luxembourg%20National%20Division%202005-06">2005–06 season</a>, Hesperange finished ninth in the <a href="Luxembourg%20National%20Division">National Division</a>. <a href="Luxembourg%20National%20Division%202006-07">The following year</a>, they improved this position to 5th, level on points with fourth-placed <a href="Racing%20FC%20Union%20Luxembourg">Racing FC</a> and sixth-placed <a href="CS%20Grevenmacher">CS Grevenmacher</a>. During the <a href="2013-14%20Luxembourg%20National%20Division">2013–14 season</a>, Hesperange finished 13th and has thus been relegated to the <a href="Luxembourg%20Division%20of%20Honour">Éierepromotioun</a>. The gained promotion back to the top division in the 2019–20 season where they finished 3rd in their first season back and qualified for play in Europe.
